languages.text: {n}Женщина слегка вздыхает.{/n} "Личное дело. Господин Кастелья, мятежный комендант — друг детства Его Светлости Эвейна. Мой господин, как узнал о его мятеже, очень опечалился и немедленно полетел сюда — в надежде образумить старого друга, не иначе".

{n}She sighs quietly.{/n} "It's a personal matter. Master Casteglia, the seditious warden, is Lord Evayne's childhood friend. When my lord heard of the riot, the news saddened him greatly and so he rushed here without delay — in hopes of bringing his old friend to his senses, no doubt."
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина слегка вздыхает.{/n} "Личное дело. Господин Кастелья, мятежный комендант — друг детства Его Светлости Эвейна. Мой господин, как узнал о его мятеже, очень опечалился и немедленно полетел сюда — в надежде образумить старого друга, не иначе".

traits.locale_text: {n}She sighs quietly.{/n} "It's a personal matter. Master Casteglia, the rebelling warden, is Lord Evayne's childhood friend. When my lord heard about the riot, the news saddened him greatly and he made his way here without delay — in hopes of bringing his old friend to his senses, no doubt."

{n}She sighs quietly.{/n} "It's a personal matter. Master Casteglia, the seditious warden, is Lord Evayne's childhood friend. When my lord heard of the riot, the news saddened him greatly and so he rushed here without delay — in hopes of bringing his old friend to his senses, no doubt."

languages.text: {n}Deja escapar un ligero suspiro.{/n} «Es un asunto personal. El maestro Casteglia, el alcaide sedicioso, es amigo de la infancia del Lord Evayne. Al enterarse del motín, mi señor experimentó tal tristeza que lo impulsó a venir hasta este lugar sin demora, con la esperanza de hacer entrar a su viejo amigo en razón».
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs quietly.{/n} "It's a personal matter. Master Casteglia, the seditious warden, is Lord Evayne's childhood friend. When my lord heard of the riot, the news saddened him greatly and so he rushed here without delay — in hopes of bringing his old friend to his senses, no doubt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deja escapar un ligero suspiro.{/n} «Es un asunto personal. El maestro Casteglia, el alcaide sedicioso, es amigo de la infancia del Lord Evayne. Al enterarse del motín, mi señor experimentó tal tristeza que lo impulsó a venir hasta este lugar sin demora, con la esperanza de hacer entrar a su viejo amigo en razón».

languages.text: {n}Sie seufzt leise.{/n} "Es ist eine persönliche Angelegenheit. Meister Casteglia, der abtrünnige Direktor, ist ein Kindheitsfreund von Lord Evayne. Als mein Lord von dem Aufstand hörte, betrübte ihn diese Nachricht zutiefst, daher eilte er sofort her ... wohl in der Hoffnung, seinen alten Freund zur Vernunft zu bringen."
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs quietly.{/n} "It's a personal matter. Master Casteglia, the seditious warden, is Lord Evayne's childhood friend. When my lord heard of the riot, the news saddened him greatly and so he rushed here without delay — in hopes of bringing his old friend to his senses, no doubt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie seufzt leise.{/n} "Es ist eine persönliche Angelegenheit. Meister Casteglia, der abtrünnige Direktor, ist ein Kindheitsfreund von Lord Evayne. Als mein Lord von dem Aufstand hörte, betrübte ihn diese Nachricht zutiefst, daher eilte er sofort her ... wohl in der Hoffnung, seinen alten Freund zur Vernunft zu bringen."

languages.text: {n}Elle soupire doucement.{/n} « L'affaire le touche personnellement. Maître Casteglia, le directeur rebelle, est un ami d'enfance du seigneur Evayne. Lorsqu'il a eu vent de cette émeute, la nouvelle l'a tellement attristé qu'il a tout de suite mis le cap sur le planétoïde... dans l'espoir de ramener son vieil ami à la raison, certainement. »
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs quietly.{/n} "It's a personal matter. Master Casteglia, the seditious warden, is Lord Evayne's childhood friend. When my lord heard of the riot, the news saddened him greatly and so he rushed here without delay — in hopes of bringing his old friend to his senses, no doubt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle soupire doucement.{/n} « L'affaire le touche personnellement. Maître Casteglia, le directeur rebelle, est un ami d'enfance du seigneur Evayne. Lorsqu'il a eu vent de cette émeute, la nouvelle l'a tellement attristé qu'il a tout de suite mis le cap sur le planétoïde... dans l'espoir de ramener son vieil ami à la raison, certainement. »

languages.text: {n}她轻轻地叹了口气。{/n}“这其实算是私事，造反的卡斯特格利亚大人从小就是艾维尼的朋友。听说发生叛乱的时候，我的主人非常难过，毫不迟疑赶来这里。很显然，他希望能让他的老朋友清醒过来。”
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs quietly.{/n} "It's a personal matter. Master Casteglia, the seditious warden, is Lord Evayne's childhood friend. When my lord heard of the riot, the news saddened him greatly and so he rushed here without delay — in hopes of bringing his old friend to his senses, no doubt."

traits.locale_text: {n}她轻轻地叹了口气。{/n}“这其实算是私事，造反的卡斯特格利亚大人从小就是艾维尼的朋友。听说发生叛乱的时候，我的主人非常难过，毫不迟疑赶来这里。很显然，他希望能让他的老朋友清醒过来。”

languages.text: {n}彼女は静かにため息をつく。{/n}「個人的な事情です。扇動している所長のカスティーリア殿は、エヴァイン様の幼なじみです。暴動の知らせを聞いた我が主君は大変悲しまれ、すぐにここへ駆けつけました。間違いなく、旧友を正気に戻そうとしたのでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs quietly.{/n} "It's a personal matter. Master Casteglia, the seditious warden, is Lord Evayne's childhood friend. When my lord heard of the riot, the news saddened him greatly and so he rushed here without delay — in hopes of bringing his old friend to his senses, no doubt."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は静かにため息をつく。{/n}「あの方個人の問題です。渦中の所長カスティーリア様は、エヴァイン様の幼なじみです。殿下は暴動の件を聞き、とても悲しまれて、すぐにここへと駆けつけました…もちろん、旧友を正気に戻すことを願ってのことです」
{n}彼女は静かにため息をつく。{/n}「個人的な事情です。扇動している所長のカスティーリア殿は、エヴァイン様の幼なじみです。暴動の知らせを聞いた我が主君は大変悲しまれ、すぐにここへ駆けつけました。間違いなく、旧友を正気に戻そうとしたのでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Sessizce iç çekiyor.{/n} "Şahsi bir mesele. Başkaldıran müdür Üstat Casteglia, Lord Evayne'in çocukluk arkadaşıdır. Lordum ayaklanmanın haberini aldığında fevkalade üzüldü ve zaman kaybetmeden buraya geldi. Hiç şüphesiz, eski dostunun aklını başına getirmeyi umuyordu."
languages.original_text: {n}She sighs quietly.{/n} "It's a personal matter. Master Casteglia, the seditious warden, is Lord Evayne's childhood friend. When my lord heard of the riot, the news saddened him greatly and so he rushed here without delay — in hopes of bringing his old friend to his senses, no doubt."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sessizce iç çekiyor.{/n} "Şahsi bir mesele. Başkaldıran müdür Üstat Casteglia, Lord Evayne'in çocukluk arkadaşıdır. Lordum ayaklanmanın haberini aldığında fevkalade üzüldü ve zaman kaybetmeden buraya geldi. Hiç şüphesiz, eski dostunun aklını başına getirmeyi umuyordu."
